definitions.meaning: Changshou suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan

sentences.simplifiedText: 我住在重庆市的长寿区。
sentences.traditionalText: 我住在重慶市的長壽區。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhù zài Chóngqìng shì de Chángshòu qū.
sentences.translation: I live in the Changshou district of Chongqing city.

sentences.simplifiedText: 尽管我在重庆市的长寿区住了很多年，但是该地方的美景和繁华依然让我感到惊叹不已。
sentences.traditionalText: 儘管我在重慶市的長壽區住了很多年，但是該地方的美景和繁華依然讓我感到驚嘆不已。
sentences.pinyin: Jǐnguǎn wǒ zài Chóngqìng shì de Chángshòu qū zhùle hěnduō nián, dànshì gāi dìfāng de měijǐng hé fánhuá yīrán ràng wǒ gǎndào jīngtàn bùyǐ.
sentences.translation: Even though I have lived in the Changshou district of Chongqing city for many years, the beautiful scenery and prosperity of this place still make me amazed.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他每天做瑜伽，希望自己能长寿。
sentences.traditionalText: 他每天做瑜珈，希望自己能長壽。
sentences.pinyin: tā měitiān zuò yújiā, xīwàng zìjǐ néng chángshòu.
sentences.translation: He does yoga every day, hoping to achieve longevity.
